title: Why Some Books You're Looking To Buy On Amazon Aren't There
teaser: Amazon is making it harder for customers to get books published by Hachette and its imprints. Amazon wants deeper discounts on the publisher's books; Hachette is balking. So if you go to the online retailer looking for, say, the new J.K. Rowling mystery, Amazon tells you the hardcover is currently unavailable.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
